00041 void
00042 RangeServerClient::load_range(const sockaddr_in &addr,
00043     const TableIdentifier &table, const RangeSpec &range,
00044     const char *transfer_log, const RangeState &range_state,
00045     DispatchHandler *handler) {
00046   CommBufPtr cbp(RangeServerProtocol::create_request_load_range(table, range,
00047                  transfer_log, range_state));
00048   send_message(addr, cbp, handler);
00049 }
00050 
00051 void
00052 RangeServerClient::load_range(const sockaddr_in &addr,
00053     const TableIdentifier &table, const RangeSpec &range,
00054     const char *transfer_log, const RangeState &range_state) {
00055   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00056   EventPtr event_ptr;
00057   CommBufPtr cbp(RangeServerProtocol::create_request_load_range(table, range,
00058                  transfer_log, range_state));
00059   send_message(addr, cbp, &sync_handler);
00060 
00061   if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00062     HT_THROW((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr),
00063              String("RangeServer load_range() failure : ")
00064              + Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr));
00065 }

00104 void
00105 RangeServerClient::create_scanner(const sockaddr_in &addr,
00106     const TableIdentifier &table, const RangeSpec &range,
00107     const ScanSpec &scan_spec, ScanBlock &scan_block) {
00108   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00109   EventPtr event_ptr;
00110   CommBufPtr cbp(RangeServerProtocol::create_request_create_scanner(table,
00111                  range, scan_spec));
00112   send_message(addr, cbp, &sync_handler);
00113 
00114   if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00115     HT_THROW((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr),
00116              String("RangeServer create_scanner() failure : ")
00117              + Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr));
00118   else {
00119     HT_ASSERT(scan_block.load(event_ptr) == Error::OK);
00120   }
00121 }

00157 void
00158 RangeServerClient::fetch_scanblock(const sockaddr_in &addr, int scanner_id,
00159                                    ScanBlock &scan_block) {
00160   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00161   EventPtr event_ptr;
00162   CommBufPtr cbp(RangeServerProtocol::
00163                  create_request_fetch_scanblock(scanner_id));
00164   send_message(addr, cbp, &sync_handler);
00165 
00166   if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00167     HT_THROW((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr),
00168              String("RangeServer fetch_scanblock() failure : ")
00169              + Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr));
00170   else {
00171     HT_EXPECT(scan_block.load(event_ptr) == Error::OK,
00172               Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00173   }
00174 }

00229 void
00230 RangeServerClient::get_statistics(const sockaddr_in &addr,
00231                                   RangeServerStat &stat) {
00232   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00233   EventPtr event_ptr;
00234   CommBufPtr cbp(RangeServerProtocol::create_request_get_statistics());
00235   send_message(addr, cbp, &sync_handler);
00236 
00237   if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00238     HT_THROW((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr),
00239              String("RangeServer get_stats() failure : ")
00240              + Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr));
00241 
00242   const uint8_t *decode_ptr = event_ptr->payload + 4;
00243   size_t decode_remain = event_ptr->payload_len - 4;
00244   stat.decode(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00245 }

00288 
00289 void
00290 RangeServerClient::send_message(const sockaddr_in &addr, CommBufPtr &cbp,
00291                                 DispatchHandler *handler) {
00292   int error;
00293   uint32_t timeout_ms = (m_timeout_ms == 0) ? m_default_timeout_ms
00294                                             : m_timeout_ms;
00295   m_timeout_ms = 0;
00296 
00297   if ((error = m_comm->send_request(addr, timeout_ms, cbp, handler))
00298       != Error::OK) {
00299     HT_WARNF("Comm::send_request to %s failed - %s",
00300              InetAddr::format(addr).c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00301     HT_THROWF(error, "Comm::send_request to %s failed",
00302               InetAddr::format(addr).c_str());
00303   }
00304 }
